entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
